articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Newly-built Pyongyang Home for Aged
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Newly-built Pyongyang Home for Aged
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the newly-built Pyongyang Home for the Aged.
					 Going round different places of the home, he learned in detail about its construction and preparations for its operation.
					
					 He said that the home was successfully built to suit national character and flavor, adding that, the longer one watches, the more fashionable it looks and every aspect of the structure was constructed to meet the requirements of physical bodies, ages and mentality of its health-seekers.
					
					 Heated floor rooms and bedrooms were built to cater to the taste of health-seekers, dining rooms were constructed to create homelike atmosphere and stairs were designed in such a way as not to give any inconvenience to old people when moving in line with the instruction given by me when visiting the construction site last time, he noted.
					
					 He said that service and healthcare establishments including barber's, beauty parlor, bath and treatment rooms look impeccable and library, sporting room and amusement hall were also successfully built for the cultural and emotional life and physical training of health-seekers.
					
					 Noting that an air-conditioning system by use of geotherm is introduced into the home to smoothly settle the issue of regulating temperature and outdoor resting place was arranged well and greening of its environment done very well, he said, adding he was very pleased with everything.
					
					 The appearance of Pyongyang Home for the Aged along with Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage in a good place has turned this area into a district which vividly shows President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's love for the people, he noted.
					
					 He said with emotion that the completion of the home for the aged made it possible to realize another lifetime desire of the great leaders.
					
					 The aged persons will be very pleased to come to the new home, he said, instructing officials to hold a ceremony for completing the home for the aged and let them settle there as soon as possible as they are looking forward to the day of moving to it.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the solider-builders who had successfully completed Pyongyang Home for the Aged as intended by the Party Central Committee would perform greater miracles and feats in the new worksites for building a rich and powerful country entrusted to them by the party.
					
					 He was accompanied by O Su Yong, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Jae Il and Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Greetings to Macedonian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Macedonian FM
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Sunday sent a message of greeting to Nikola Poposki, foreign minister of Macedonia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop more favorably in common interests.

articles.title: More Meetings Held to Respond to Appeal of Participants in Conference of War Veterans
articles.content:
More Meetings Held to Respond to Appeal of Participants in Conference of War Veterans
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- More meetings were held to respond to the appeal of the participants of the 4th National Conference of War Veterans.
					 They were held in South Phyongan, North Hwanghae, Jagang, Kangwon and Ryanggang provinces and Nampho City on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were officials of local party, power and economic bodies, working people's organizations, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 The appeal was read out at the meetings and speeches were made by representatives of workers, agricultural workers and youth and students to vow their pledges.
					
					 The speakers said that they will fully demonstrate the heroic spirit and mettle of the Korean people in the general offensive for final victory in confrontation with the U.S. and the building of a thriving nation by inheriting the same gem-like single-minded loyalty and revolutionary faith which one would not abandon though one may die and noble spirit of defending the country displayed by war veterans.
					
					 They called for devotedly protecting the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and creating miracles and innovations in production and construction, being firmly convinced that national reunification and thriving nation will surely come true under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They underscored the need to create a heroic epic in the great Kim Jong Un's era and a myth of new victory of Songun Korea by carrying forward the tradition in which the former generations won only victories in rigorous annals.

articles.title: Red Flag Relay of KPA Servicepersons Starts
articles.content:
Red Flag Relay of KPA Servicepersons Starts
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- A red flag relay of the servicepersons of the Korean People's Army (KPA) began on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The relay racers divided into eastern and western parts will meet at Panmunjom. They will manifest the iron faith and will of the service personnel to achieve the historic cause of national reunification without fail under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un by fluttering the red flag of the revolution associated with the whole life of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There was a kick-off meeting before the statue of the President at the Samjiyon Grand Monument on Sunday.
					
					 Present at the meeting were general officers, officers and soldiers of the KPA.
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of the President and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A report was made by Ri Chang Gil, chairman of the KPA Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					
					 The reporter said the relay would offer a good occasion for arming the servicepersons with the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, and show the faith and will of the servicepersons to achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Songun without fail under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The report was followed by the oath-taking speeches.
					
					 The speakers expressed their determination to grasp the glorious revolutionary history and exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and finally achieve national reunification in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 A red flag embroidered with the letters "The revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu" was given to the racers and the relay started.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Soccer Team Beats Its Japanese Rival 4:2
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Soccer Team Beats Its Japanese Rival 4:2
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's soccer team on Saturday beat its Japanese rival 4:2 at the first match of the 2015 EAFF Women's East Asia Cup in Wuhan, China.
					 The league match games from August 1 to 8 brought together teams of the DPRK, China, Japan and south Korea.
					
					 DPRK footballers Ri Ye Gyong and Ra Un Sim scored two goals each at around 36, 66, 80 and 81 minutes.

articles.title: DPRK Will Continue to Win through Generations: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Continue to Win through Generations: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists kept themselves busy holding a ground-breaking ceremony for a monument to entry into the Korean war in San Francisco and an event called "memorial wall" at the "Korean War Memorial Park" in Washington to call back the departed souls of those who met miserable deaths in the Korean war with July 27 this year as an occasion. They were also reported to have held a ground-breaking ceremony for a monument to the battle in Lake Jangjin in Virginia by gathering riff-raffs including those who narrowly survived in the Korean war and those who are more dead than alive.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 Many countries of the world celebrate victories in wars but the U.S. only "commemorates" the defeat.
					
					 The U.S. foolish farce is aimed to paint defeat as victory and thus save the U.S. from suffering continued setbacks in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are mentally abnormal as they are set to hold commemoration events, far from feeling ashamed of the repeated defeats unprecedented in the world history of wars it suffered from the Korean war. 
					
					 With no intrigues and embellishment can they change the history of defeat into that of victory. 
					
					 July 27 would always instill self-esteem and pride into the service personnel and people of the DPRK but ceaseless disgrace and despair into the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The DPRK will always emerge victorious as it is led by the great Songun brilliant commander.

articles.title: U.S. Slammed for Trumpeting about Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S. Slammed for Trumpeting about Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Of late, riff-raffs of the U.S. are claiming that if the DPRK has clear willingness to give up its nukes, talks between the DPRK and the U.S. would be possible and that the U.S. is approaching dialogue related to the north's nukes with open-minded attitude and the ball is in the court of the north side. In a nutshell, they mean that the U.S. sincerely hopes for the opening of the talks on nukes but dialogue is not opened because the DPRK is not showing sincerity.
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This is shameless sophism which can be made only by the U.S., master of disguise and kingpin hatching plots and intrigues.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which drove dialogue for settling the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula into catastrophe and it is also the U.S. which is throwing a stumbling block in the way of opening the dialogue.
					
					 The DPRK has become a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and to abandon it is unimaginable. This is a stark reality.
					
					 This means that gone are the stage in which denuclearization was discussed between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is trumpeting about dialogue for denuclearization as before. It is aimed to convince the public that dialogue is not resumed due to the DPRK, now that the U.S. is being criticized at home and abroad for its failed policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 But such a petty trick is unworkable to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to draw a lesson from this stark reality, think with reason and behave properly, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Is Disqualified to Be Dialogue Partner: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Is Disqualified to Be Dialogue Partner: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Kim Mu Song, representative of the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea, on a visit to the U.S. flatteringly proposed the U.S. master an "initiative for diplomatic security" to make the north give up its line of simultaneously developing the two fronts. Ahead of him, a spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Unification of south Korea dared make vicious remarks that "it was deplorable that the north's above-said line hindered the improvement of livelihood and economic development", impertinently urging the north to opt for the "way of peace and unification" in response to the proposal of "dialogue".
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday discloses in a commentary that the south Korean puppet forces don't want dialogue but confrontation as evidenced by their vilification of the DPRK's above-said line, despite their much-touted "dialogue".
					
					 It is a disgusting behavior that the south Korean puppet group indulges in disparagement by tampering with the reality in the DPRK making eye-opening changes, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean group of traitors are shame on the nation and source of evil as it kowtows to the U.S. which seeks to inflict a nuclear disaster upon the Korean nation, yet groundlessly slandering and hurting the just independent line of the DPRK and its dignified social system.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the south Korean puppet group hasn't got qualifications as a dialogue partner since it pursues confrontation with fellow countrymen with the backing of outsiders.
					
					 It is evident to everyone that the group of stooges can not have the least sense of consciousness and mission for the national destiny as it venomously defames the same nation which firmly defends the national sovereignty.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group will understand what a high price it will have to pay for its vilification of the DPRK.

articles.title: Punishment of Japanese Enterprise Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Japanese Enterprise Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Council with Grandmothers of "Volunteers Corps" in south Korea held a press conference in Kwangju on July 30 at which it called for punishing a Japanese enterprise which committed crimes during the Second World War.
					 The organization accused Mitsubishi Heavy Industry of denying its crime-woven history, far from making an apology and reparation to many Koreans who suffered from the forced labor in the past.
					
					 It said it would conduct the campaign of boycotting all goods of Mitsubishi Heavy Industry and 100 000-people signature campaign.

articles.title: Japan's Moves for Reinvasion Censured
articles.content:
Japan's Moves for Reinvasion Censured
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held the 159th rally for peace and disarmament outside the puppet Ministry of Defense on July 31.
					 It said that it was disclosed through media that the U.S., Japanese and south Korean authorities are holding a confab to help Japan's "Self-Defense Forces" exercise the "right to collective self-defense" and reinvade the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It has also been exposed that the ministry is pushing forward working discussions at all levels for military cooperation with Japan not to the people's knowledge when Japan is trying to pave the legitimate way of reinvasion by railroading security bills, the organization charged.
					
					 Japan's moves for reinvasion can never be allowed, it said, urging the ministry to immediately stop all discussions on Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense".

articles.title: Actions for Peace against War Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Peace against War Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- More than 40 civic and public organizations in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 30 at which they formed the committee for promoting August 15 all-people conference for peace against war, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 At the press conference the committee said military tension is escalating on the Korean peninsula and in Asia.
					
					 The U.S. is becoming all the more pronounced in its moves for building the triangular military alliance to press the north, and Japan is talking about intervention of the "Self-Defense Forces" and a preemptive attack in case of contingency on the Korean peninsula, it noted.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is zealously cooperating with them, it said, calling upon all people to turn out in actions for peace under the unfurled banner of the movement for peace against war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Introduced in Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on July 27 posted on its website the full text of the congratulatory speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 4th National Conference of War Veterans.
					 The congratulatory speech, made on July 25, Juche 104 (2015), said that July 27 of Korea is the day of second liberation when the country's dignity and sovereignty were honorably defended from the aggression by the U.S. imperialists, and also the day of victory that put the U.S. imperialists on a downhill turn of ruin.
					
					 It said that the war veterans devoted all their life to the independent reunification and prosperity of the country, adding that their fighting spirit and patriotic feats will remain shining in golden letters in the history of the heroic struggle of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries between July 24 and 27 on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They included celebration meetings in Belarus and Switzerland, seminars in Germany and Austria and a lecture in Guinea.
					
					 The first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus who doubles as chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il said in his speech that the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was the brilliant fruition of the matchless bravery and devotion displayed by the Korean army and people under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, gifted strategist and iron-willed commander.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee said with high appreciation that the progressive people warmly praised the President as the great leader of the cause of global independence who defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany stressed in his speech that it is the immortal exploits performed by the President that he won a great victory in the war against the U.S. and defended the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 The chief of the Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Austria noted at a seminar that he came to clearly understand that under the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung the army and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S. that boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and the provoker of the Korean war was none other than the U.S.

articles.title: Solidarity Meeting with Korean People Held in Egypt
articles.content:
Solidarity Meeting with Korean People Held in Egypt
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Egypt on July 25 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Displayed in the venue of the meeting were photos dealing with the war victory exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Speakers denounced the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK and strongly demanded the U.S. withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea at once and stop all acts straining the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 At the meeting a solidarity statement was adopted to support the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. ceaselessly conducts provocative and aggressive war maneuvers in south Korea to prevent the Korean people from building a thriving nation and to harass the peace and security on the Korean peninsula, the statement said.
					
					 We denounce the forces following the U.S. for joining the U.S. plot against the Korean people by taking advantage of the tyranny and arbitrariness of the imperialists, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 We extend once again militant solidarity to the Korean people struggling for defending the just cause of mankind while frustrating the arbitrary practices of the U.S., devil on earth, and its followers.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Celebrated in India
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Celebrated in India
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- An Indian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed in New Delhi on July 28.
					 The general secretary of the Indian National Congress Party was elected chairman of the committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events including a meeting, seminar, lecture, photo exhibition and film show from July 28 to October 10.

articles.title: Regional Body Slams S. Korean Authorities' Crime against Humanity
articles.content:
Regional Body Slams S. Korean Authorities' Crime against Humanity
						
 Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a statement on July 28 denouncing the south Korean puppet forces for forcibly detaining the DPRK residents.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Juche idea followers in the African region strongly demand the south Korean authorities unconditionally send back the detained DPRK residents who were adrift in the East Sea of Korea in line with the UN Charter and the international conventions on human rights. 
					
					 International and national bodies should neither remain indifferent nor approach the matter selectively but denounce the crime and demand the immediate repatriation of the three DPRK residents who were detained against their will.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas love peace and wish for national reunification as they are members of the homogeneous nation with thousands of years of history.
					
					 It is not beneficial to defy the Korean people's will.
					
					 The unanimous requirement of all the Korean people should not be turned away.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Asilo de Ancianos de Pyongyang recien construido
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Asilo de Ancianos de Pyongyang recien construido
						
Pyongyang, 2 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dirigio en el terreno el Asilo de Ancianos de Pyongyang nuevamente construido.
					Dando vueltas por varios puntos, hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de la obra y de los preparativos de gestion.
					
					Dijo con satisfaccion que el asilo se ha construido dando destaque al sentimiento y matiz nacionales y todas las instalaciones estan acondicionadas bien conforme a la constitucion y las caracteristicas psicologicas de los ancianos.
					
					Destaco que los dormitorios con calefaccion de suelos y los otros con camas se construyeron conforme al gusto de los ancianos, segun las instrucciones dadas por el mismo durante su ultimo recorrido, y agrego que el comedor y la escalera se acondicionaron bien para que los ancianos se sientan el clima familiar sin tener incomodidad en moverse.
					
					Senalo que son perfectas la barberia, peluqueria, sauna, sala de curacion y otras instalaciones de servicios publicos y medicos, asi como la biblioteca y las salas de ejercicios y diversiones se acondicionaron magnificamente para que ellos lleven plenamente una vida cultural y ejercicios fisicos.
					
					Acoto que se ha solucionado satisfactoriamente el problema de aseguramiento de temperatura con el sistema de  refrigeracion y calefaccion segun la geotermia y se ha hecho bien tanto la construccion del lugar de descanso al aire libre como la creacion de area verde del contorno y anadio que todos le gustan mucho.
					
					Gracias al establecimiento del asilo en el lugar impecable junto con el hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang, esta zona refleja integralmente el amor por el pueblo de los grandes lideres antecesores, dijo y agrego que podemos satisfacer uno de los deseos de toda la vida de aquellos grandes hombres. 
					
					Destaco que estaran muy contentos los ancianos que se muden a este asilo e indico realizar cuanto antes la ceremonia de inauguracion y mudar a los ancianos que lo esperan con ansiedad.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los constructores militares, que edificaron el asilo conforme al proposito del Comite Central del Partido, registrarian mayores milagros y meritos en los nuevos campos de construccion de la patria prospera.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por O Su Yong, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Jae Il y Kim Yo Jong.
